meanings.definition: A group of simple aquatic animals, including jellyfish and sea anemones.
meanings.sent1: The coelenterates in the ocean are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study coelenterates to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The coelenterates had a party in the coral reef.
meanings.sent4: The colorful coelenterates danced gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch the coelenterates at the aquarium.

meanings.definition: Any member of the phylum Coelenterata.
meanings.sent1: I saw a coelenterate at the marine biology exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The coelenterate displayed unique characteristics under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The coelenterate tried to join the fish school but couldn't keep up.
meanings.sent4: The coelenterate's beauty shone like a gem in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The coelenterate's presence added vibrancy to the underwater world.
